item.title: Lighthouse Gauges for Data Studio
item.description: Site speed metrics can be obtained using the Lighthouse auiting tool, which can be run within Google Chrome. Reverse Engineering How I found the code to create it. Community Visualisations How I created a comunity visualisation Free to Use Google Storage link and Github Link
